page.title: 15A NEW HOUSING ESTATE part 1
page.content: There are several new housing estates being built in Heaton Mersey.We visited Barrat's new development on Kingsleigh Road.We spoke to the site manager and sales representative.They told us that they chose this area because South Manchester is very popular.However there is a shortage of land so it is very expensive. First they had to submit plans to the Town Hall and get planning permission.Then they did a land survey.If the land is suitable they start to build roads and put in services such as water, gas, electricity and sewage.Then they build the foundations which are one metre deep.It then takes about twelve weeks to complete a large house before the buyer can move in.
